name: 4x4 Dream Race
description: You drive a 4x4 monster truck in 4 different races!
minimum_requirements: OS: 98/XP/Vista/7 Processor: 2 GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 3D Video Card

reviews.review_text: I lost my kids to child services for giving them this game; apparently child abuse is wrong these days.
